metadata.title: CVE-2016-6336 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
MediaWiki before 1.23.15, 1.26.x before 1.26.4, and 1.27.x before 1.27.1allows remote authenticated users with undelete permissions to bypassintended suppressrevision and deleterevision restrictions and remove therevision deletion status of arbitrary file revisions by usingSpecial:Undelete.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6336` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1.27.1
mediawiki-classes - 1.27.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.27.1').
